boardgame.name: Thunderstone Advance: Worlds Collide
boardgame.description: Flung through the planes of existence by rites of banishing, a few beleaguered heroes, old friends, find themselves on the very edge of Doom's original world..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Thunderstone Advance: Worlds Collide tells the story of a battle for survival in a world of ancient evil and darkness. This set showcases 550 cards from the first six Thunderstone releases, including previously hard-to-find promos, all updated and fully compatible with Thunderstone Advance, along with many fan favorites from this deck-builder's history._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Thunderstone Advance: Towers of Ruin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5021) Flung through the planes of existence by rites of banishing, a few beleaguered heroes, old friends, find themselves on the very edge of Doom_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s original world... Thunderstone Advance: Worlds Collide tells the story of a battle for survival in a world of ancient evil and darkness. The set showcases 550 cards from the first six Thunderstone releases, including some of the previously hard to find promos, all updated and fully compatible with Thunderstone Advance. It includes many fan favorites from this best-selling deck builder_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s history. Whether you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re a new player looking to try the game for the first time, or an experienced veteran wanting to update your older cards, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be able to use these vintage heroes and equipment to battle Doom and his minions, in an epic fight.
